QuestData.Title: The Pursuit of Umbranse
QuestData.Description: We have isolated Umbranse's position here in Winterspring. It is as I suspected.$b$bUmbranse is at Mazthoril, the cavern that once belonged to the blue dragonflight, in the southwest. My mother, Haleh, will greet you there. She is stationed outside of the cave in a small camp with a few other survivors.$b$bLook for her campfire.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Haleh at Beryl Egress in Winterspring.
QuestData.RewardText: You are $n, yes?$b$bGood, you will serve well. I require the aid of a $c such as yourself.
